comprehensive_overview: LyveSET is a microbial variant detection pipeline for Whole Genome Sequencing data. It identifies single nucleotide variants (SNVs), insertion and deletions (indels) using a Bayesian algorithm. LyveSET is primarily used for the analysis of bacterial genomes.
core_features: Variant detection for Whole Genome Sequencing data
Uses Bayesian algorithm for variant calling
Specifically designed for bacterial genomes analysis
